entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to periods of snow near noon and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
